Description: Building Self Learning Action Models
Full Description: Building Large Action Models as a foundation model to power our next-generation, fully interactive AI-driven operating system - AL OS1.  Our company's mission is to reinvent the use of computers and software applications through an Interactive Operating System, AL OS1, powered by a Large Action Model. The challenge at the heart of Agile Loop's mission is to democratize technology and make it accessible to everyone, regardless of their level of proficiency with computers or specific software applications. This challenge is of paramount importance because it addresses a fundamental societal issue - the digital divide. In today's increasingly tech-dependent world, the ability to navigate and utilize computers and software efficiently is no longer a luxury but a necessity. However, a significant portion of the human population, particularly older generations and individuals with limited exposure to technology, face barriers to harnessing the full potential of these tools. By developing AL OS1, Agile Loop aims to break down these barriers and empower individuals of all backgrounds and age groups. The ability to operate computers and software applications through just natural language prompts means that anyone, regardless of their tech-savvy, can access and leverage the power of technology. This inclusivity can have a profound impact on society, bridging generational and digital divides. AL OS1's capabilities enable users to perform complex tasks with simple language prompts. This level of automation can significantly enhance productivity across various sectors, from business and finance to healthcare and education. It reduces the need for manual and repetitive tasks, allowing individuals and organizations to focus on more creative and strategic endeavors. It prioritizes inclusivity, productivity, and innovation while offering solutions to pressing societal issues. These innovations have the power to redefine how we interact with technology, bridge digital divides, and create a more equitable and productive future for all.
Headquarters Regions: Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence, Data and Analytics, Science and Engineering, Software
Founders: Abdul Ahad, Ammar Anwar, Hamzah Azeem

Description: Focused on development and commercialization of recombinant human Klotho proteins to prevent and treat kidney disease and other diseases.
Full Description: KLOTHO Therapeutics (KTI) is a biotechnology company developing patent-pending Klotho proteins with great potential to redefine society’s experience with aging. Klotho, a naturally occurring human protein discovered in 1997, promises to delay major diseases of aging – kidney failure, Alzheimer’s, osteoporosis, cancer, hypertension and diabetes, according to published studies. For example, National Institutes of Health report Klotho-deficient animals live 25% shorter and look older while animals overexpressing Klotho live 20-30% longer. The company’s first focus is on kidney failure, one of the major causes of death in the U.S. that affects up to 30 million people per year, 600,000 of whom are currently on dialysis. There is no successful long-term therapy today. KTI has filed patents on modified Klotho proteins covering its expansive potential indications.
Headquarters Regions: Greater San Diego Area, West Coast, Western US

Description: Innovating the business operations and e-commerce technology for event companies
Full Description: Goodshuffle was founded in 2013 on the idea that rentals should be easy, fast, and accessible for everyone. One of our co-founders, Andrew Garcia, had a DJ business in college, and found that renting out equipment could be difficult and tedious. With his many years of experience as a Full Stack Developer, he knew he could change that. He partnered with Erik Dreyer, our other co-founder and UX extraordinaire, to build technology that made rentals easy. Their first rental marketplace was targeted at peer-to-peer rentals, but after receiving so much demand for event rentals, they transitioned to gear their rental solutions to the industry from which Andrew originally came: events. After interviewing a diverse array of event professionals, the pair realized they first must build a comprehensive software system in order to maximize the rental experience for both the vendors and the renters. They wanted to design a software program that not only did what event professionals needed it to do, but made it easy, fast and delightful along the way. With renewed focus, the duo hit the ground running. They hired our Executive Vice President, Karen Gordon, who had years of experience growing companies in both the events and technology sectors. The trio launched their SaaS platform, Goodshuffle Pro, in 2017 as a beta program and officially premiered the software at a trade show in January 2018. By 2019 the software was in 45 US states, Canada and Mexico. The company was crowned “Best Tech Startup in DC” and one of the “Coolest Places to Work” in 2020. Since then, our team, user base, and product have grown exponentially— and this is just the beginning. We are a team of former event professionals and passionate technology professionals who are dedicated to creating the best solution for our industry. We believe that technology can, and should, be easy to use.

Industries: Computer Vision, Health Care, Health Diagnostics, Machine Learning, Medical, PaaS, Software
Description: Insight Optics is a PaaS connecting general care providers to local specialists for video data transfer.
Full Description: Insight Optics, is an impact driven startup dedicated to connecting Primary Care Providers with local specialists for assisted diagnostics. We do the heavy lifting with machine learning and computer vision to ensure untrained individuals have captured the right content and that it is of a diagnosable quality prior to transmission. We have built our solution to ensure that we can capture non-adherent patients where they already are by deskilling the process and improving accessibility for the most rural, impoverished, and marginalized populations. We've made it profitable to prevent diseases for the most at-risk Americans Business Overview:  Insight Optics empowers primary care providers (PCPs) to record and refer preventative pre-screening videos to local specialists for assisted diagnostics. Our goal is to enable PCPs to efficiently detect early signs of preventable diseases before permanent damage is done. We accomplish this by providing PCPs a platform to connect and send patient data to local specialists. This allows both users to monetize otherwise unrealized referral incentives and provide better care. Problem: Over 154 million patients in the United States are recommended for an annual retinal exam, especially those with a history of diabetes or high blood pressure. Unfortunately, less than 50% of this population will receive their screening due to the difficulty of visiting a specialist, lack of education or available specialists. However, most of these patients do see PCPs annually.   Solution: We’ve developed a telemedicine PaaS, enabling PCPs to record and refer retinal exams to local specialists for assisted review. PCPs create a new revenue stream through reimbursements and government incentives. Specialists find qualified leads and increase their screening capacity without the need for in-person appointments in a non-adherent population. Benefits: The OptoView system acts as a new revenue stream for both PCPs and specialists through reimbursement. The tool satisfies HEDIS requirements for PCPs and acts as a lead generation tool for specialists to find new patients. Annual reports determine whether managed care organizations receive reimbursements or penalties from state and federal agencies. Our application is designed to satisfy the requirements for annual diabetic eye screenings, increasing an organization’s compliance rates and ophthalmologists prioritize sick patients.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Atlanta Area, East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence, Data and Analytics, Hardware, Health Care, Software
Founders: Aaron Enten, Jermaine Fanfair, Theodore LaGrow
Top 5 Investors: Health Wildcatters, Microsoft, Newchip, CREATE-X, TiE

Description: A technology company on a mission to revolutionize the building and transformation of IoT powered businesses through decentralized AI.
Full Description: T-DAB.AI is technology company on a mission to revolutionise the building and transformation of Internet of Things (IoT) powered industrial businesses through decentralised artificial intelligence (AI).   Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning can deliver high ROI across many applications in industry, but its widespread adoption is hampered by a lack of suitable machine learning infrastructure and the need to centralise data which in turn leads to high costs, privacy risks, overdependency on cloud platforms and network availability.   To solve these barriers to AI for Industrial IoT, T-DAB.AI are harnessing a simple but revolutionary idea. Rather than move data from Edge devices to central cloud platforms to train algorithms, move the algorithms to the data and learn at the Edge. Intelligence is achieved by combining learning on many devices via a novel technology called Federated Learning.    To deliver this, T-DAB.AI has created a decentralised AI platform for industrial IoT: OctaiPipe. OctaiPipe represents a paradigm shift in AI solving high value industrial machine intelligence use cases whilst vastly reducing costs, privacy risks, and network or cloud dependency. Customers can either buy pre-built solutions or develop their own to deploy and scale on OctaiPipe.
Headquarters Regions: Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence, Data and Analytics, Internet Services, Science and Engineering, Software
Top 5 Investors: Innovate UK, Kinled Holding, Deeptech Labs, Growceanu Angel Investment

Description: Nido focuses on the development, manufacture and marketing of efficient and low-cost underwater robots aimed at the underwater sector.
Full Description: Nido focuses on the development, manufacture and marketing of efficient and low-cost underwater robots aimed at the underwater sector. The startup has gone through the accelerator Ocean Blue in 2017, with funding from the Xunta de Galicia, and they are currently part of the Shuttle program. They do not have any individual investors, except for a small group that participated in a 3F round (friends, family and own funds) that took place in 2017 and where they managed to raise €25K, with a valuation of 200K. Nido allows to reduce the risk for personnel working in an underwater environment (activity that always harbors certain risks) and the cost of inspection, maintenance, underwater repair, scientific research, etc. In addition its technology allows an improvement of CAPEX and OPEX. In less than two years, the company's activity has been recognized with several awards and grants, such as the Emprendia loan granted by the ICREF and the Murcia Development Institute (valued at €50,000), being part of the RYME + Internationalization program, the recognition as 'Startup of the Month' granted by the Institute of Development of Murcia, and the prize 'Start-up of the year' of Murcia Initiation of the City of Murcia (including €14,000 to fund lost, plus €3.6K of ENAE Business School) . They also received  the 2017 INFO-CLH Entrepreneur of the Year award. The headquarters of Nido is in Murcia, from where they maintain commercial relations with different countries of the European Union, such as Greece, Germany, Ireland, Scotland, Norway and Latin America. They have already sold more than 60 robots, characterized by the high capacity to adapt to the specific needs of each use case, and without losing the possibility of being produced in series. Apart from this capacity of "Mass Customatization", the production processes and the materials used allow them to be extremely competitive in terms of costs.

Description: BEAM is an one layer privacy blockchain scalable confidential cryptocurrency based on Mimblewimble and Lelantus-MW.
Full Description: BEAM is a next-generation conﬁdential cryptocurrency based on an elegant and innovative Mimblewimble protocol. Things that make BEAM special include: • Users have complete control over privacy - a user decides which information will be available and to which parties, having complete control over his personal data in accordance with his will and applicable laws. • Conﬁdentiality without penalty - in BEAM conﬁdential transactions do not cause bloating of the blockchain, avoiding excessive computational overhead or penalty on performance or scalability while completely concealing the transaction value. • No trusted setup required.• Blocks are mined using Equihash Proof-of-Work algorithm. • Limited emission using periodic halving with a total amount of coins ~250 million. • No addresses are stored in the blockchain - no information whatsoever about either the sender or the receiver of a transaction is stored in the blockchain. • Superior scalability through compact blockchain size - using the “cut-through” feature of Mimblewimble makes the BEAM blockchain orders of magnitude smaller than any other blockchain implementation. • BEAM supports many transaction types such as escrow transactions, time-locked transactions, atomic swaps and more. • No premine. No ICO. Backed by a treasury, emitted from every block during the ﬁrst ﬁve years • Implemented from scratch in C++ by a team of professional developers
Headquarters Regions: Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA), Middle East
Industry Groups: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Financial Services, Other, Payments, Privacy and Security, Software
Top 5 Investors: Altonomy, Lemniscap, Youbi Capital, Collider, Continue Capital

This provides retailers with the ability to “bankarize” consumers without the need for high setup costs, specialized tellers, a check cashing licence, check fraud management, compliance requirements, or data retention and reporting. Cardholders have the benefits of instant bankarization, meaning that they gain access to full financial services immediately at the retailer via a reloadable prepaid debit card. This enables them to reload funds via cash or check and immediately request cash back (check cashing alternative), participate in e-commerce and micro-lending, and use online and mobile banking.

Description: Rooba.finance:India's first blockchain-based regulatable tokenization platform democratizing investments.
Full Description: Rooba.finance is India's pioneering full-stack blockchain-based tokenization platform. It leverages cutting-edge technology to provide an unbroken chain of custody from off-chain to on-chain assets, ensuring exceptional security and transparency for issuers and investors. The platform stands out for its innovative approach to democratizing investments by tokenizing a variety of assets, including securities, commodities, real estate, and non-market linked instruments. Rooba.finance's core offerings include Rooba Mint, a tokenization engine, and Rooba Vault, a self-custody solution for digital assets. The platform also features a decentralized pool of independent financial and legal partners, known as The Guild, providing an extra layer of security against central authority manipulation.  With its revolutionary approach, Rooba.finance injects liquidity into traditionally illiquid markets and allows for efficient price discovery. The platform is designed to accommodate a highly liquid marketplace for digital asset trading with rapid transaction finality and top-tier blockchain security.  Rooba.finance's services extend to private equity, private debt, commodities, and real estate tokenization, catering to a wide range of investment preferences. The platform also offers Rooba Concierge, a premium support service available round the clock to help clients navigate the rapidly changing financial ecosystem.  The platform's robust design, innovative offerings, and commitment to democratizing access to various investment opportunities position Rooba.finance as a leading force in India's digital asset space.

Industry Groups: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Financial Services, Lending and Investments, Other

Description: Private equity investors and SaaS accelerator
Full Description: RELENTLESS is a SaaS technology-focused private equity accelerator, located in San Luis Obispo Ca. They partner with entrepreneurs and product experts to take an active role providing mentorship, capital, and best practices for each of their portfolio companies. Entrepreneurs have great passion and creativity for the products and services they produce. The RELENTLESS goal is to quickly harness that passion while incorporating proven leadership, sales, and business management systems into each of these companies. Through staggered admissions and mentorship tailored to the unique strengths and needs of individual founders and business, the RELENTLESS team creates a custom acceleration path, avoiding generic advice and focusing on what founders need, when they need it. RELENTLESS does not raise capital on behalf of its companies but does assist and support the effort if the need becomes apparent. This means we typically engage with companies after they have raised capital (preferred), or when they are in the process of raising capital and need the resources and expertise of RELENTLESS to help bolster investor confidence

Industries: Blockchain, Content Creators, Media and Entertainment
Description: Sybel.io is a Web3 content app and ecosystem with Creator-Fi, Social-Fi and some Game-Fi elements.
Full Description: The Sybel Ecosystem is built to align interests of Creators and their Community in order to reinvent the IP monetization market. Creators mint their Work as a NFT and can fractionalize it in different rarity tokens to offer their community the opportunity to buy some shares, in exchange for profits, rewards or even governance rights (micro DAO). Then, when a User interacts with content (by listening, watching, reading...), on the platform of their choice, Creators earn tokens (SYBL) that they share with Users. Repeated interactions will advance Users to the next level earning them special NFT. Creators’ and Users’ SYBL earnings are stored in the in-app custodial Wallet created for them. Custodial Wallets have a built-in Swap function.

Description: Software editor founded in 2015, offering a SaaS application that delivers IoT based connected services for factories
Full Description: InUse is a connected maintenance SaaS application that makes machines talk to improve production performance of factories By embedding industrial expertise within the machines, InUse transforms their usage data into concrete recommendations for operators in factories. It enables the machines to request the maintenance operations they need and to guide the operators towards the best action to be taken according to the production context. All production actors are thus augmented with a collective intelligence directly embedded into the machines. Designed to deliver connected maintenance services in factories, InUse offers the opportunity to address many industrial challenges faced by manufacturers through a single application. InUse allows them for example, to predict the future failures of the machines and significantly reduce the time to restart after a production breakdown. Based in Paris, InUse is part of the Alliance pour l’Industrie du Futur as well as the French Fab. InUse customers include Shem (Engie), Sidel, Alfi Technologies, PellencST and ICE Water Management.

Description: RosVivo Therapeutics is a biotechnology company it develops microRNA-based therapeutics for type 2 diabetes, obesity, fatty liver disease.
Full Description: RosVivo Therapeutics is a biotechnology company it develops microRNA-based therapeutics for type 2 diabetes, obesity, fatty liver disease.  RosVivo Therapeutics targets diseases with breakthrough therapies utilizing microRNA (miRNA) and small interfering-RNA (siRNA) drugs.  Discovery research conducted by Dr. Seungil Ro’s laboratory recently identified key miRNAs responsible for the onset and development of Type 2 Diabetes (T2D). Preclinical studies show depletion of these key miRNAs lead to the development of not only T2D, but also obesity, fatty acid liver disease, hyperlipidemia, and gastroparesis. Remarkably, restoration of these miRNAs reverses these disease states.

Description: Providing green CO₂ from the open air
Full Description: Carbominer is an ambitious climate tech startup that has developed new technology to capture carbon dioxide from the open air locally. The business model is providing green CO₂ as a service to commercial clients, that aim to transition to sustainable operations. Potential applications include, but are not limited to indoor agriculture, decarbonisation of the construction industry, and carbon removals.  The company offers modular plug-and-play CO₂ Direct Air Capture technology, embedded in transportable 20ft shipping containers. Carbominer's DAC technology stands out due to the ability to use cheap intermittent renewable electricity. Combined with the local capture (no need for liquefaction, storage, transportation, etc.), it opens the path to the lowest cost possible for Direct Air Capture of CO₂

Full Description: It's not a secret that our brains are wired to respond to visual content. Images and videos are at the heart of all marketing strategies. Visual quality is more important than ever. But websites are heavier than ever, and the main culprits are visual assets. They eat up network bandwidth and increase the time visitors spend waiting for pages to load while being responsible for most of the carbon emissions on the Web.  Moreover, tailoring media is extremely challenging with all kinds of devices, screen sizes, and network qualities out in the wild. TwicPics smartly automates images and videos processing. As a result, it guarantees visual quality and web performance while reducing websites' carbon footprint. Major brands and startups use TwicPics to: - accelerate the display of web pages - deliver pixel-perfect images and videos tailored to each client device - simplify their workflow - produce eco-designed websites TwicPics impacts the main KPIs of websites and apps: conversion rates, engagement, and SEO.

Description: OMG Digital creates digital editorial brands for African millennials.
Full Description: OMG Digital creates digital editorial brands for African millennials. It has been hailed as the  "Buzzfeed of Africa" for its millenial-targeted content.  Like BuzzFeed and other similar companies, OMG Digital monetizes through digital marketing. Currently 80 percent of its ad sales are from banner ads, but as in other markets, its advertisers are seeing a smaller return on investment and looking for alternatives that are more suited to mobile screens (about 90 percent of OMG Digital’s users access its content through mobile devices, in particular Android smartphones). About 60 percent of OMG Digital users are between 18 to 24 years old and one of its value propositions is helping overseas companies figure out how to reach young African consumers in different markets (for example, in some countries Twitter is more popular than Facebook, so localized strategies need to take that into account). OMG Digital has already partnered with Coca Cola, Huawei, KFC, Philips, Pringles, and several of Africa’s largest telecoms, including MTN, on marketing campaigns and sponsored content.

Full Description: Sundrop Farms is a leader in sustainable horticulture for the arid world; growing high-value crops using seawater and sunlight. They are the only company in the world with the technology and know-how to develop and operate greenhouses in locations that have little or no access to arable land, fresh water sources, or grid energy . We have created a proprietary food production system which grows high-quality produce year-round in greenhouses that use the abundant and renewable resources of sunlight and seawater. As the world’s population continues to grow, traditional agriculture puts increasing pressure on our planet’s finite resources. Sundrop Farms decouples food production from those resources by relying on nature’s abundance of sunlight and saltwater to grow the world’s food industry — not just profitably, but also sustainably.

Description: Sound Particles is a CGI software for Sound Design, capable of using particle systems to generate thousands of sounds in a virtual 3D world.
Full Description: Sound Particles is a CGI-like software for Sound Design, capable of using particle systems to generate thousands of sounds in a virtual 3D world. Particle Systems are a common tool used in computer graphics and VFX to create fuzzy/shapeless objects like fire, rain, dust or smoke. Instead of animating all individual points (water drops, grains of dust or smoke), the user creates a particle system, an entity that is responsible for the creation and management of thousands of small objects. Sound Particles uses the same concept, but for audio: each particle represents a sound source (instead of a 3D object) and a virtual microphone captures the virtual sound of the particles (instead of the virtual CGI camera).
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Industry Groups: Community and Lifestyle, Manufacturing, Media and Entertainment, Music and Audio, Software

Description: Folia Materials: using paper as a super material
Full Description: Folia Materials exists to make everyday life healthier and more sustainable. We do this by transforming ordinary paper into a super material. One capable of making unsafe tap water drinkable, protecting against global viruses via face masks, and even improving the way our food is packaged.Folia has spent years inventing and patenting the world’s cheapest and most effective process for marrying ordinary industrial paper with a coating that transforms it into an extraordinary good. Our patented coating process uses standard industrial coating machinery to do nano-chemistry inside paper, bonding nanosilver to paper at the fiber level. We don't own any industrial equipment and yet we have manufactured tonnes of our coated paper.   It costs us pennies to make our paper which goes into: -Subsidiary Folia Water Global's water filter, which sells for 20 cents in South Asian grocery, piloted with Unilever.. think of their $1B soap brands sold across India -An antiviral layer for 3-ply face masks and air filters inside a Fortune 500's appliances -And a paper-not-plastic microwave food packaging, piloting with a Fortune 100 CPG brand -Many more

Description: TMV is an early-stage investment firm that focuses on the future of living well.
Full Description: We are in the middle of a profound cultural sea change. Long gone are the days where hype and marketing jive alone will triumph. It is now meaning and purpose that serve as the backbone of a company’s staying power and provide the strength to remain sustainable and scalable.   Fewer than  one-third of Americans trust traditional sources of wisdom: government, media, religion and big business. This trust has eroded, particularly for millennials and Gen Zs, who now represent more than half of the U.S. population. Yet, many companies that have tried hastily to capitalize on that broken trust have only broken it further with false and inflated promises.   Now more than ever, people are seeing through the hype and massive fundraising rounds and are seeking purpose and meaning when it comes to making decisions to invest in or build a business.   In response, a new generation of companies dedicated to these principles is emerging, and gaining traction. These are the billion-dollar opportunities that will fundamentally transform the way we work, live and care for ourselves and others.   TMV has assembled a team of battle-tested operators, with proven records of spotting and amplifying inventive young companies that are bringing about this change. Our Terrain Purpose-driven founders reimagining… The Way We Work: We invest in companies that help both workers and entrepreneurs cultivate talent Logistics and Mobility: We invest in companies creating transparency and efficiency around global trade and movement Sustainable Solutions: We invest in the circular economy The Care Economy: We invest in companies broadening access to care Education Tech: We invest in companies advancing education systems   Our Commitment We make investments that reflect the way the world actually looks.  As a female-led fund with a portfolio that’s 65% women- and minority-owned, TMV represents an opportunity for a more inclusive society and culture. We are committed to investing in diverse companies because it’s simply good business. We pledge to put more capitalistic power into the hands of women and people who are BIPOC (Black, Indigenous, and People of Color).    If you like our approach and want to talk to us about how to leverage capital for a better tomorrow, we want to listen.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Investment Stage: Early Stage Venture, Secondary Market, Seed
Industry Groups: Education, Financial Services, Health Care, Information Technology, Internet Services, Lending and Investments, Transportation

Description: Good Therapeutics develops new technology for self-regulating drugs that will provide a therapeutic activity when, where it is needed.
Full Description: Good Therapeutics develops new technology for self-regulating drugs that will provide a therapeutic activity when, where it is needed. It is an early-stage biotechnology company based in Seattle, Washington. They are developing context-dependent protein drugs that sense biomarkers and respond with therapeutic activity. Their goal is to make safer, more effective drugs that act only when and where they are needed, limiting systemic toxicity without reducing therapeutic efficacy.  Their core technology is an algorithm for designing allosterically-regulated proteins. These proteins change their conformation (shape) when they bind a biomarker or metabolite, and in doing so activate a therapeutic domain. They are currently focused on immuno-oncology applications of the technology.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Seattle Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Science and Engineering

This network enables content to securely hop between devices, until it reaches a destination or an Internet exit point, improving range and deliverability. Description: AONDevices is a semiconductor company specializing in super-low power smart Edge AI solutions
Full Description: AONDevices (AON) is a semiconductor company that specializes in creating application-specific, edge AI processors and solutions. They have developed proprietary neural network processors and tools that allow for high-accuracy processing of sensory data at super-low power consumption, making it perfect for battery-powered "always on" devices. AON's technology allows for a natural human-machine interface at the device level, without the need to send data to the cloud. This approach improves user privacy and experience. When integrated into devices such as phones, wearables, game controllers, vehicles, smart home appliances, industrial applications, and more, AON's solutions enable constant sensing to detect multiple events concurrently. For example, AONVoice™ and AONSens™ cores can recognize multiple voice commands and sound events, like a baby crying, glass breaking, emergency sirens, machine anomalies, while also detecting specific motion patterns such as walking or falling. Founded in 2018 by a group of industry veterans with deep expertise in audio processing and AI, AONDevices is headquartered in Irvine, CA, and is privately held. Their technology and solutions have already been licensed and used by tier-1 customers.

Description: OverWatchID is a Cyber-Security software company with a solution to solve Identity Defined Security issues.
Full Description: OverWatchID delivers Privilege Anywhere™ for companies with cloud first initiatives, applications and cloud infrastructure running in Amazon AWS, Azure and Google Cloud. Easily protect and secure privilege users from any cloud application to on-premise infrastructure. Privileged user credentials continue to be the top target by attackers. Whether through phishing or malware, a privileged user constantly needs to protect their credentials and identity. OverWatchID is committed developing and delivering technology that protects privileged users. The OverWatchID solution delivers full privilege security for cloud applications, cloud computing and hybrid IT environments, and on-premise infrastructure. Industries: Artificial Intelligence, Health Care, Information Technology, Machine Learning, Technical Support
Description: Kirontech uses cutting edge machine learning technology to revolutionize the use of healthcare data.
Full Description: Each year, the healthcare insurance industry loses nearly half a trillion dollars due to Fraud, Waste and Abuse. With our state-of-the-art artificial intelligence solutions, fraud, waste and abuse are identified at source and inefficiencies are reduced across the board. KironAI is the most advanced and specialized AI solution in the healthcare insurance market, and our proprietary algorithms allow the platform to handle millions of complex claims with ease. By combining the techniques of AI and our extensive industry knowledge of medical claims data, Kirontech will change the way health insurance works for good. There is a growing consensus that AI technology has a vital role to play in the future of health insurance, in the elimination of fraud, waste and abuse, the streamlining and reinforcing of risk assessment processes, and in network optimization. But how? Kirontech works with extensive medical claims data, using machine learning AI to improve the bottom line of insurers, third party administrators and reinsurers, and increase quality of care through better monitoring and management of providers. KironAI uses dynamic “graph–based” learning, which means it discovers rules and patterns from within the data, rather than simply scanning for pre-specified ones; it observes, learns and adapts to new relevant patterns too complicated for the human eye to pick up. The system is ultra-fast and resilient, designed to learn even from scarce data. Kirontech is based in Cambridge, an internationally recognized technology hub. With a presence in London, the largest centre for underwriting commercial and specialty risk in the world, Kirontech is perfectly positioned to make use of its top technical and domain expertise to address the serious issues which impede the health insurance business today. But more than anything else, Kirontech is about its people. With its unique combination of skills and expertise, our team works to innovate the healthcare industry through the application of new technology that has already proved its value across many other domains.
Headquarters Regions: Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence, Data and Analytics, Health Care, Information Technology, Other, Science and Engineering, Software

Description: Heartland Industries is a material science company.
Full Description: Heartland is a material science company that engineers natural fibers as additives for plastics. Heartland's additives enable manufacturers to reduce their carbon footprint by upwards of 50% in the first 3 years. Over time, it's become clear that all of the materials we rely on every day have a really high carbon footprint. This means that it's our responsibility to figure out how we can collectively reduce the negative impact that these raw materials have on our planet. As a natural fiber processor, we work with farmers, manufacturers, and their suppliers to embed high-performance carbon-negative additives into various raw material supply chains.  Almost everything that can be seen or touched is made from plastic, rubber, foam, wood, paper, ceramic, or building materials. Infusing natural fiber additives into these existing raw materials allows manufacturers to increase the performance and reduce the carbon footprint of the products they're already manufacturing. Join us in a carbon negative future.

Since 2015, MiLA Capital has seen a gap in SoCal’s startup hard tech ecosystem; talent was incredible but fragmented while capital was plentiful except for seed stage hardware founders. We addressed that by raising an early stage venture fund, building an innovation lab known as Toolbox LA, recruiting a values-driven community of founders and mentors, and connecting hundreds of talented founders with the resources they need to impact the world. We also operate the Make in LA accelerator to find, nurture, and invest in promising hardware companies at the earliest stages.  We believe that undiscovered hardware founders are too often overlooked, and we are the right team to fund them at the significant inflection point of pre-manufacturing.

Description: HAIZOL is China's leading professional online sourcing service platform for custom parts and components.
Full Description: HAIZOL is China's leading professional online sourcing service platform for custom parts and components, designed to propel domestic small and medium sized manufacturing enterprises to the global theater of procurement resources, meeting output quotas and manufacturing capacities of traditional parts and component manufacturers, integrating upstream and downstream industry supply chains, optimizing both the manufacturer's business model and revenue structure, accelerating the realization of production and management intelligence. At the same time, HAIZOL's online platform solidifies both the global online procurement and service market, establishing a dynamic data and business intelligent model, independent research and development intellectual digital tools, implement a transparent delivery model throughout the entire supply chain, standardize procurement of custom parts and components, improving the overall procurement efficiency of the industry. HAIZOL Online has established manufacturing contracts with over 600,000 parts and components factories throughout China. Full Description: Our mission is to make digital ads work for everyone and save small businesses $38BN a year. We are a C-Corporation incorporated under the name Custom Social Inc., in the state of Delaware in 2019. The Company’s principal product is Arrow Boost, a browser extension that uses Artificial Intelligence to help Small Businesses market themselves more effectively on Facebook.  Our Mission is to make digital advertising work for everyone, everywhere.  What we do is build effective, easy-to-use, and affordable digital advertising tools for millions of Small Businesses and “solopreneurs”. Small Businesses are being “left behind” when it comes to digital advertising and are often underserved by agencies and enterprise platforms built for larger companies. We believe that when small businesses win, we all win.     Our business model is self-serve SaaS tools that are high value, affordable, and integrate seamlessly into major advertising platforms. We charge $9 per month per user for Arrow Boost.  Our products are end-to-end self-serve, do not require a sales team or staff for onboarding.  The user simply downloads the extension from the Google Chrome store, installs it, and starts using it right away.  We offer instructional videos, FAQs, and limited online chat support.     The company plans to build a suite of browser extensions so small businesses can find their potential customers everywhere in the digital advertising ecosystem: Pinterest, Connected TV like Roku, Tik-Tok, Snapchat, and other digital channels.

They can save small and midsize employers more than 33% on health insurance premiums while improving employee health benefits. Become an empowered consumer and never overpay for healthcare again. Their website and mobile apps make it possible for medical consumers to choose their care based on price, quality, and convenience. MyMedicalShopper is addressing a huge need in the market by integrating actual medical procedure cost data with real-time consumer insurance information in order to create an unparalleled, personalized tool. The driving vision is to reverse the trend of rising healthcare costs and to develop technology to interpret, create, and display the symmetric data needed to transform the healthcare industry into a fair market for consumers. In addition to the personal savings that each user can realize their business customers are purchasing their platform to take a proactive approach to reduce their health benefits costs. Businesses are benefiting from MyMedicalShopper in a number of important ways: providing the MMS app to their employees as a new benefit; reducing health insurance premiums as a direct result of reducing their total medical claims; and saving the time, money, and frustration associated with administering health savings accounts (HSAs), health reimbursement arrangements (HRAs), and flexible spending accounts (FSAs) through MyMedicalShopper’s robust employer dashboard. MyMedicalShopper is empowering informed decision-making by providing instant access to their expansive data through its technology platform, which is accessible through their iOS and Android mobile apps, as well as their website.

Description: A robotics company on a mission to bridge the gap between humans and robots - starting with Rosie - the first housekeeping robot for hotels.
Full Description: Tailos is on a mission to bridge the gap between robots and humans - starting with Rosie - the world's very first housekeeping robot for hotels and commercial buildings. Like a self-driving car, Rosie navigates intelligently through the space while cleaning floors and collecting invaluable operational and environmental data. Tailos' automated systems deliver unprecedented value to hotel operators, room attendants, and hotel guests. There are three major issues Tailos is tackling: *Housekeeping is the highest variable cost regardless of the hotel. *Room attendants have the highest injury rates in the service sector. *Current commercial cleaning practices are inconsistent and hard to objectively manage. By using Tailos' systems, hotel and commercial cleaning operators will see an increase in profitability; healthier and happier staff; and higher guest satisfaction. In addition, room attendants will be able to focus on less strenuous tasks - ultimately reducing injury rates. Finally, guests will have a more enjoyable experience through consistent cleanliness and more flexible check-in and check-out times. Given the size and scale of the hospitality market, a lack of innovation in the field, and the potential to improve the health and safety of room attendants; Tailos transforms the industry by leveraging the power of robotics. By solving the two biggest issues in housekeeping – time and injuries – Tailos revolutionizes commercial cleaning - one bot at a time.

Description: Sign, send and store your files for free
Full Description: KwikTrust has developed an e-signature and file storage platform and the patent pending SuperNFT, a more secure form of NFT that incorporates provenance and the owner's validated identity. The technology opens up new asset classes to NFTs including financial assets, stocks and shares, insurance plus physical and digital assets. On 14 March 2022 KwikTrust KTX utility token listed on BitMart Exchange at https://www.bitmart.com/trade/en?symbol=KTX_USDT KwikTrust incorporates an e-validation platform that provides provenance and legal protection. The platform enables self-certified and third-party validation of files, with the results stored securely on a blockchain, creating an irrefutable record of activity.   Users can record and validate intellectual property origination, contracts, accounts, invoices, references, qualifications, identities, video and audio files, and undertake know-your-client checks. Intellectual property and other assets can be represented digitally - including property deeds, company shares, asset ownership, and validated identities - which can be minted into a SuperNFT as a permanent and transferable record of ownership. .    The KwikTrust solution is faster, simpler, more secure and less expensive than competitors. It features - triple lock security; each file is locked onto the blockchain with three separate hashes.

Currently, the company provides a unified technology platform two offerings:  Commercial Smart Room System: AI Cloud / Energy Management System: This first of its kind free-standing system includes a patented modular hub that is controlled via AI Cloud algorithm managing a mesh network of in-room smart bulbs, switches, and a multitude of IoT sensors and devices, creating an affordable and future-proof smart ecosystem. The CIRQ+ commercial Smart Room system can help properties streamline operating costs by saving up to 40% on energy costs that lead to reducing carbon emissions.  Additionally, CIRQ+ has launched CBOT the world’s first autonomous disinfection robot that eliminates pathogens without manual labor creating healthier and safer spaces for all with Healthcare, senior living and daycare focus. With its intelligent platform capabilities and deep innovation roadmap, CIRQ+ is primed to become a leading automation leader!

Description: Mallinda has developed the first intrinsically-recyclable carbon fiber composite that can be molded and reformed, by the end-user.
Full Description: The name "Mallinda" is a mashup of the words "malleable" and "industries". Mallinda is a developer and material supplier of Pliashell, a new platform technology of  intrinsically recyclable and malleable self-healing polymers for the rapidly growing advanced composites industry. Pliashell is a new class of malleable thermoset polymers that enables the manufacture of lightweight, strong, remoldable, and recyclable composite materials.  Pliashell advanced fiber reinforced composites have demonstrated ability to be molded at relatively low temperatures. The absence of a curing step drastically reduces manufacturing cycle times. This technology is revolutionizing product development in a variety of market segments
